0x00000001


Linux Application Memory Leak Test

With Deamon

valgrind --leak-check=full --log-file="logfile.out" --trace-children=yes --track-origins=yes -v ./splunk start

Without Deamon

valgrind --leak-check=full --log-file="logfile.out" -v ./splunk start
